dbi.pg.PgResult

class PgResult: dbi.BaseResult.BaseResult;
Manage the results of a PostgreSQL result set. This class implements all of the current DBD Result interface. The interface is not described here again, instead please view Result directly.

See Also:
Result

this(PGresult * res);
Params:
PGresult * res PostgreSQL result structure.
